website_summaries.verdict: A one-size-fits-all windshield cover that provides excellent protection, but the magnets that keep it in place can also be detrimental to your paint job.
pros: Comes in a large size that fits most cars and trucks
Stays put in most weather conditions, and has security flaps for added protection
cons: The built-in magnets that keep it in place can scratch a car's finish
We recommend extra caution when putting it on and taking it off your windshield

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this back in October for my son for either his birthday or Christmas, wound up giving it to him for Christmas. It is now too late for me to return but if I can keep someone else from wasting their money I will. DO NOT BUY THIS!!! It froze to his windshield every time he used it, even if he wiped the windshield off before putting it on. He would have to heat up his truck in order to be able to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: LA Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight - and that's a GOOD thing!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how lightweight this cover was - "flimsy!" was the thought that went through my mind. However, after two icing/snowing nights in Colorado, I am very impressed with this cover. Yes, it's thin but it feels as durable as something much heavier, and the light material makes it easy to handle and store. It fits my Honda Odyssey like it was custom-made and even being fussy about position and catching the flaps in the doors and such it goes on in about a minute. Best solution short of another garage space!
customer_reviews.author: James Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The magnets have all rubbed holes in the fabric and come out. It has only been a few months
customer_reviews.author: Jess & Phil

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Best thing since sliced bread! I bought 3 more for xmas gifts. Just takes a minute to put on, but saves you 10 minutes in the cold. Great product, well made, fits my Chevy 2500HD perfect, stays in place too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Scratches Car Paint
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Didn't last a week before it started to fly off my car in mild winds. Then discovered the magnets created scratches on my one-year-old car. VERY dissatisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Stuebinger

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful Using this Cover
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my father-in-law, whom is a dairy farmer. He was using a piece of cardboard, for his work/farm truck, prior to get one of these from us, as a Christmas gift. Unfortunately, the magnets are strong enough to pull paint off, as well as scratch while taking the cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Hubby & I ARE very pleased with this windshield protector
customer_reviews.text: Hubby & I ARE very pleased with this windshield protector. The magnets are very strong, " and DO NOT scratch the vehicle. Yes, it's an extra time consuming winter project duty, but it's so worth taking the little extra time, as one does not need to scream and moan about "scraping the buildup from the windshield." When I ride with Hubby, then he has some " extra helping hands" and helps the little extra time needed, cut in half.😊 Be sure to pull it tight, so any wind doesn't raise disaster and deem the purpose ineffctive. 😶😏😥 We highly recommend this windshield protector. ***We have tried other windshield protectors " ALL TO NO AVAIL!!" ***
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, instruction short and to the point and magnets are super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Loki2654

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: We live in New England, so I recently purchased a Huge Size Ice King windshield cover for the coming winter months because scraping ice off the windshield is no fun. So far, I've used it once in preparation for a frosty morning. It was easy to install (provided instructions are pretty thorough) and it did the job. The built-in magnets and straps will be helpful in keeping the cover in place should the wind decide to start blowing during the night. This thing is huge, so it will make a great sail if not secured properly.
customer_reviews.author: WAB

customer_reviews.title: I have a 2015 Subaru Outback and it fits the windshield nicely, easy to install and the magnets work great
customer_reviews.text: I received my windshield guard very quickly - and had to wait for the snow (which I didn't mind at all). Now we have had snow off and on for a week. I have a 2015 Subaru Outback and it fits the windshield nicely, easy to install and the magnets work great. I place it on the windshield when I arrive at work and in the evening when I leave I remove it, shake it off, and place it in the back to dry for the next day. Would definitely recommend. As a matter of fact, one of the guys from work went on to Amazon and ordered one for his Jeep. Great job, Ice King.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratch!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a f250 with a lift and this is not easy to install on. You have to through it half way over then pull it from the other side. The first time I used it it left three huge scratches in the hood. Do not use
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Pro - Works as advertised. It protected my Windshield from the Ice Neg - the parts that come in to contact with the cars paint or mirrors freezes to the vehicle. Also this is way to big for a Chevy TrailBlazer
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Care!
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't snowed yet, but will soon!! Meanwhile, the company has already provided superb "customer care" when we felt we had not ordered the correct size in the first place. They assured us that if it did not fit our Volvo sedan we could send it back with no questions asked. We "tried it on for size" as soon as it arrived and we are actually glad that it is "Extra Large". The material seems to be a bit thin, but if it is as good as its Customer Care we will love it! Hopefully I can re-visit this when the snows fall and I will be happy to give it another review!
customer_reviews.author: Arlita M. Winston

customer_reviews.title: magnets need to be stronger; they scratch the paint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover to ensure snow would not pack in the well where my wipers 'park'. It fits my Equinox perfectly and accomplished this task. However, if there is any wind, the magnets are not strong enough to keep the cover in place... Seriously disappointed as I look out the window and see the bottom edge of the cover flapping in the wind!!! And, in the end, left scratches in my paint!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. I put this on for one night, and in the morning it was wrapped around itself from a little wind. The magnets were cheap and could barely hold them selves on, let alone keep this mini single ply toilet paper on my windshield. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: This product WILL scratch your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This item worked very well at keeping ice and snow off of window even in a storm. It was quite difficult for one person to put inside doors however if the wind was blowing. I would NOT recommend this product however. The magnets that were inside the shield left scratch marks all over the hood and sides of the car from not sealing well, in even a slight wind. It took a great deal of time removing scratches from my new car. I had to purchase a special scratch remover, since some were quite deep. This item was applied as instructions said.
customer_reviews.author: Fran wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Was sssoooooo easy and quick peeling back the windshield cover prior to ...
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these for Xmas gifts. Put them both on our SUVs last night before the East Coast storm of 3+ inches. Was sssoooooo easy and quick peeling back the windshield cover prior to going to work in the morning without all the fuss of cleaning and scraping the windshield ....LOVE the huge size! ...covers windshield, side mirrors and front driver/passenger windows ...tiny magnets are strong enough to secure everything in place. ...now daughter wants one to replace the small one she bought from a competitor last year. DEFINITELY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gaye Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Good winter protection.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since bad weather came to our area. This cover goes on easily. The magnets hold cover securely. The only thing I worry about this cover is wear to store it after removing it from the car. I put the cover in the garage, however with this area normally getting below "0" conditions the cover will never dry out and remain frozen. So putting it back on my car could be difficult. I will add to this review if that happens.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Durable lightweight but a hassle to put it on
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. Kind of a hassle to get on especially if there is any wind. It froze to the car I one storm me was really difficult to get it off. Thought I was going to tear it,but didn't. Gave it three stars because it is durable but only three stars because it's not that handy to put on. Kind of a hassle like I said before. Thought maybe I could use it as a sun shade in the summer but I haven't bothered because of how it isn't super easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: tejas

customer_reviews.title: No more icy windshield.
customer_reviews.text: So far we have use this for two ice storms, and it has worked fine. We ordered the large covering and if you look at the picture you can see how it covers are ram 1500 truck. It has a reflective side, as well as a side with their logo. This will fit your truck. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: GretaRay

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: Well, I just got this in mail and I can tell it's CHEAP. Poor quality and I have no idea how it will stand up to any wind as it's thinner than others I've owned. I will say that its huge and should fit the SUV I own 4Runner, however I am very concerned about ripping and tearing just trying to remove from a partially frozen window. I've got thicker material on my grill cover as this thing is less than half that weight.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it in the snow as of yet but so far so good. Fits fine on my Chevy Silverado. A little hard to get pulled tight across the windshield but that is due just to size of the truck. I will use this at night after getting home from work since my truck doesn't get a spot in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: James from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the Ice King Magnetic Windowshield. Easy to put on his Dodge 1500 pickup window sheild when he gets home from work. Eliminates the ice scrapping in the morning, his truck is warmed up, window clean and ready to go when he is. Light weight, magnets hold tight to the cab, South Dakota wind doesn't blow it around the sheild cover dries fast and ready to be put on at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: debbra kutnyak

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2007 Murano, so I'd say the width is about 2 feet longer than the windshield, and the heith is 8 to 10 inches more. that should give you a perspective on how large it is. It's a lite material with magnets sewn in. I'd compare the material to like an umbrella sleeve. But it's sturdy enough and gets the job done. I found that giving it a shake removes most/all of the build up ice or water. I've had no issues with it drying. I just toss it into the cargo area of my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: brotherspartan

customer_reviews.title: the product worked great. When it is liquid elements like rain and ...
customer_reviews.text: When it is just ice and frost, the product worked great. When it is liquid elements like rain and snow, the flaps that close in the doir allowed raina nd water to seep in: car seats on both passanver and river sides weree soaked. In sub-freezinh temperaturs, the magnets broke out of the cover. While a great concept, this purchase did not hold up to the description. I would not purchase it again... Bought this for a present- the gift receiver is not happy with product at all.
customer_reviews.author: lanie

customer_reviews.title: Still have to scrape.
customer_reviews.text: A slight wind will blow snow under it making it freeze to your window. It was also missing magnets on the bottom half.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!
customer_reviews.text: Useless!!! After placing it on my car it make no change the snow will go after and it's really not that good to hold on and it's not locked well like there is no way you can actually prevent snow going under! I throuw it away after first use!
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We live in New England and park one of our cars outside. I wanted to get my husband a cover that was light and easy to put on and off. There are so many brands to pick from. Our don picked this one for me and it was a great choice. Easy to use, covers the wind spans then some. Folds up nicely. My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Works good but watch out for the magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great fit for my Chevy Silverado 1500. The cover has straps that latch to both mirrors to help hold it in place. The one item that the “jury is out debating” is the magnets. I have an old truck so I don’t care about my paint job, but if I had a new truck, I’d be worried the magnets are scrapping any dirt across my paint. The magnets are sticky and did a decent job of holding the cover, not perfect, but good enough. I’m happy but I’ll check my paint in the Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wast your money, this product will not save your windshield
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin, Beside on bothe side have bands , but the magnate not holding whine the wind blowing, I thought, the manufacture knows, that this product for winter, this is why the customer buying to provent windshield from ice, and windy wintwer, but unfurtunatly, looks like the manufacture live in Bahama , and don’t know about the cold winter of Chicago or Washington DC. I don’t recommend this products to anybody, don’t wast your money
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Okay, I guess
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says but it’s not worth the hassle. If you are anticipating bad weather, put it on as soon as you can because the thing is paper thin and will fly away. Then the battle ensues draping it across the entire windshield while it’s madly flapping in the wind. The magnets help, but only once it’s in place. Honestly, I get big laughs when friends watch me struggle to get the thing on. I’ve used it once this winter and I think I’m just going to throw it away. It’s just taking up space in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better off using cardboard
customer_reviews.text: This the material is too lightweight and the magnets are very weak. You would be better off using a leaf bag and refrigerator magnets... Do yourself a favor and buy a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: The Toyman

customer_reviews.title: not easy to use for small, short people:)
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and was packaged well. I am 5ft tall and 110lbs. This cover was way to unwieldy for me to attach by myself. It is very lightweight so that was not the issue..it ws the method of attaching to the door insides....would be very difficult to do if it was windy outside. Took me about 30min to "almost" get it attached correctly. I am sure it would be easier for someone taller and bigger. I returned it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful for this product. I have a few debilitating physical medical conditions, that makes it difficult to scrape ice and snow off of my windshield. I have a 7 passenger minivan and the size is just right for the windshield. I am extremely satisfied with this product. I purchased one for my fathers dually truck and it was the right size for that windshield. I have recommended this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not great in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.text: The product will keep snow and ice off and stay in place as long as there is no wind. Not the easiest to put on in wind and I have to stick it in my backseat still wet so at some point t you’d want to dry it so it doesn’t start to smell. The side mirror string broke the first time it was used. Probably due to the wind.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: but this product is no good! I live in New England and the winters ...
customer_reviews.text: Im not a person that likes to complain... but this product is no good! I live in New England and the winters can be full of bad weather. I Bought the ice/snow shield for my sister and I. I have a Toyota Tundra. Long story short: although its a great idea: this one sucks. The magnets are so week, the slightest wind will unleash them, and will chip you paint in heavy winds. The elastic attached to help you keep tight while closing door, is s wet a this cooked pasta. I would not recommend this product to my enemy! waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Mike w

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 2 sets of windshield covers and side mirror covers to family members for Christmas, and they are both very happy with the way they fit on their car & Ford F-150 pickup truck. The items are not at all flimsy and a better fit and quality than any others I have bought. We haven't had horrible weather yet, but it's coming, and they are looking forward to seeing the success of their easy-to-use covers that will save loads of scraping time in the mornings!
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my truck. It's too thin and light weight. The only thing I like about it was it will cove your window. On a windy day it hard to put on car! I ended up buying a much better one and trashed this one!
customer_reviews.author: K J

customer_reviews.title: “Scratches are us “ should be company name
customer_reviews.text: In bad weather you have wind, snow, freezing rain, and heavy downpours of rain. The magnets move and scratched the crap out of my car. I had to buy different ones from a store for a lot more money. But the second ones I purchased are much better and no damage to either of my vehicles. Now I have a $40,000 crossover all scratched. If you want to be next, buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like scratches on your hood great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dodge truck three-quarter ton which is very tall so there’s no way to get it on and off without sliding it from one side to the other there so call magnets scratch the hell out of my truck now I have to take it in to see if they can buff out these fine scratches save your money I would suggest never buying one with magnets and less you can reach across your windshield
customer_reviews.author: Ehrfurth F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Installation is time consuming. The magnets stick before the shade is in place so you have to drag them across the paint to pull it tight. The inside tiedowns should be velcro instead of the string that takes time to tie to the visor and then to untie. The magnets never hold anything in place and a mild wind will blow the entire cover up over the roof. My final straw was when it flipped up and let some snow under the cover and fell back in place Then the snow melted slightly and refroze which fused the cover to the windshield. The material was so thin that it shredded when I had to pull it off the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Upton

customer_reviews.title: This cover is way to big for my jeep. ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover is way to big for my jeep. I also found when removing it from the windows it scratched the side of my car. This is a lease vehicle so damage is not appreciated. Anyone using this product must be very careful to lift the magnetic sections carefully off the car or risk damage to you car. The product itself is very flimsy. I expected it to be a thicker product.
customer_reviews.author: Durlyn larson

customer_reviews.title: I love the loops around the mirrors and the magnets
customer_reviews.text: Finally used it today with our first snowfall of the season. I love the loops around the mirrors and the magnets ... they are strong magnets. It looks great on the car. Very easy to put on. I’ll have to wait and see how easy it is when the snowfall is all over.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Okaaaay but no thanks
customer_reviews.text: Small magnets, you have to tie and untie it inside of your car. It's very large so you have to tie it to tighten it to fit. I live in a very cold area and I dont want to stay in -42 weather just to adjust this thin plastic cover for 7 to 10 mins. Was not worth it. Ended up buying a thicker one which I can just put over my windshield which is truly magnetic and keeps the ice from forming on it and no ties needed. Highly wouldn't suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubeez11

customer_reviews.title: Caution when considering this...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that this fit my windshield and had loops for securing shield around side morrors. It also did a great job of keep all snow off my windshield and wipers. However...the magnets have done a number on my cars paint job. Now I have scratches all over the hood and sides of my car wherever the magnets were placed to secure the shield. Overall, it does do the job, but I’ll never buy this type of windshield cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I used one on each of our SUVs and we got around 6" of snow and the covers worked well. What we mostly liked was that it not only covered the entire windshield but also the windshield wipers and the sprayers for the washer fluid.
customer_reviews.author: fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Worked great during snow storm
customer_reviews.text: Happily, this arrived before an historic snow storm and it worked great. Although the wind blew sideways and drifted snow, the magnets held the cover in place. One suggestion: Add something at the ends of each of the tabs' elastic ties to make it easier to untie/undo. I made the mistake of making a square knot in the two ties and it took a small tool to pull the elastic ties knot apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Gramma

customer_reviews.title: good function and fair price
customer_reviews.text: Its a little hard to get in on and off, but also its plenty big for my 06 Honda Pilot. I have a large rubber mat with rolled up sides in the rear of the vehicle. The frost and ice that fell and melted need a way to catch the water.and should be required in all vehicles. Melt water would have been all over the back
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gadbury

customer_reviews.title: It fits. It works.
customer_reviews.text: This windshield cover fits my 2005 Honda Pilot wonderfully and works well to keep ice and snow off of my windshield, wiper blades, and front sprayers. It has some great features, as well such as loops to fit the cover that is perfectly positioned for my rear view mirrors, and magnets to hold the cover down. Also, its thinness makes it a snap to remove the cover and to fold it down to size.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Durable, Sun/Debris Shield for Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful cover is strong and durable, and long lasting even in the hot Southern US sunshine. It protects my vehicle from the large amount of debris that falls from a tree which hangs over the driveway and I recommend it for anyone needing daily protection from leaves/debris in warm and/or stormy climates such as those found in the Southern United States. It could have been a bit thicker, which is why I’ve withheld a 5th star, but for the price it’s right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: TheRareEarths

customer_reviews.title: works well enough, but scratches paint
customer_reviews.text: it does work, I ordered two, but am returning one of them, not going to use that one on a new vehicle. The other reviewers are absolutely right about scratching up, or marring your vehicle paint job. Luckily, I'm using this product on an old vehicle, and care more about keeping ice off windshield than the painted surface. Does do a pretty good job. As for installing it, it is a lot easier with two people. doing it by yourself is a pain, and most likely the reason for a scratched surface on paint.
customer_reviews.author: i'm_your_huckleberry

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy windshield protector.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar product years ago but of better quality and so much easier to use. It had heavy-duty magnets on its sides as well as its top and bottom All I had to do was magnetic to one side of the car and then the other. I swear I could have assembled it in a wind storm...no problem. This one was a royal pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Dermody

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these without the magnets and it was a total mistake! So glad I have this one now. The only complaint I have is that it WILL scratch your car if you aren't careful when you put it on, so watch out! Otherwise this thing has been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for me
customer_reviews.text: I only tried it once. I still had a small layer of ice on the windshield after removing this product from my windshield. It may save some scraping time, but given the time it takes to put it on and take it off, I'm not sure much time is saved. The other major issue with this product is that you need somewhere to hang it to dry after removing. I'm not sold on it, and wish I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I anticipated; however, we used it before our last snow/ice storm on our Ford F-250 and it worked great. Love that it has magnets by the edges. We just stick it to the side of my husbands toolbox to hang while not in use so it dries. The carrying pouch it cones with is super useful when he takes it to work with him on snowy days. Great customer service too!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Oaks

customer_reviews.title: What's up.  .  .
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job especially in this fall weather. The magnets are strong and the fabric is good, but there should be some indication of which end is up or 'left/right'. Takes five minutes to install and that's if you get it right the first time !
customer_reviews.author: R. Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Works Better Than the Other Two I Tried
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, I'm a bit concerned that the mirror straps re going to eventually break - seem flimsy. The magnets make this windshield cover work much easier and more efficiently than the first twp models I tried and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: J. Willis Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I own a Subaru Imprezza that has a large front windshield. This covers the entire area. The magnets enable me to put it over the windshield wipers as well as the windshield. The unfortunate thing is that it is a perfect rectangle, so it is too long at the top in order to be long enough to cover the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: David Brollier

customer_reviews.title: Good thought put into the design. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover so far. Magnetic feature is great. Good idea for outside mirror strap. Also , the other elastic string. I tie to outside door handle. Haven’t had a good snow here in Maine yet, but very pleased so far. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Northern

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use (even for a 60+). Now if I can just out guess the weather. Very good instructions included with the window cover and I am glad it has so many magnets to hold it down tight on Blazer. I bought it because of the extra magnets and, even though it is an Extra Large, I had no trouble fitting it to my vehicle. Good product, as advertised, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: M Duitsman

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized cover for cars parked outside. There are heavy duty magnets in the cover so use care in covering and removing the cover from your car. It will scratch it! It does work well with staying on your car, even in a storm.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lanehart

customer_reviews.title: Has been working great in our Utah weather
customer_reviews.text: Has been working great in our Utah weather, and we are having a heavy snow, ice winter...Fairly easy to put on our truck.. The magnets help a lot. Great product...
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Huge time saver for ice and snow!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn’t expect much from this with the cheap price, by it works perfectly. Just have to remember to put it on the night before and you can’t put it on a windshield that it already wet or it could freeze to the windshield. If you drag it across the paint, I feel like the magnets could scratch, but if you remove it carefully, there should be no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dotson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this windshield cover and it has really helped
customer_reviews.text: I really like this windshield cover and it has really helped. After the first use though, it had areas that looked a bit sheer. Almost like it’s not going to last the season.... The magnets are great and really cling to my car and do not scratch the paint. I have a Toyota Tacoma and it has ample room for a larger windshield... it all tucks into the doors neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Otter Pop

customer_reviews.title: This thing is Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This windshield cover is perfect. It's wide and long enough for a pickup truck and a mini van. This is my second cover and I plan on purchasing a third one. the magnets hold it in place even on windy days. The size allows me to cover the windshield wipers, the entire windshield and leaves plenty left to put inside the doors.
customer_reviews.author: cemig

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I cant wait to use this in the winter. It looks like it will work fine, I tried it out on my car and it held up great overnight, but I still have to see how it works when we get snow. Im glad I bought it now.
customer_reviews.author: mclachli

customer_reviews.title: Ice King Extra Large Universal.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on the front windshield of husband's big high truck. Great purchase. Hard to adjust on windsheild first few times but once I finally got a system down, easy peasy. Durable and season #2 coming up this year.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous5

customer_reviews.title: No more scraping
customer_reviews.text: Fills a need to keep two vehicles frost free in the morning without having to scrape. Very effective and so easy to install and remove. At times it is wet when removed so storing becomes a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Harry E. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This windshield cover works great.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Michigan and we've already gotten significant snowfall. The Ice King is actually on my 1999 Suburban as I type this review. Since I have an older vehicle, it takes a lot longer for the defrost to heat up. With this cover, all I have to do is take it off, shake off the snow and ice, and put it in the back of the car for next time. It's awesome and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Therron

customer_reviews.title: So Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful this winter. Easy to use and lightweight. Does a pretty decent job of keeping the frost away. Occasionally we'll get a little frost underneath, but it's nothing that hasn't been easy to clear with the wipe of your blades. My only con is the magnets can scratch up the car if it's got any amount of dirt on it, so take care when you're applying it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap... I have one another one I brought, only to small for my window so I ordered these with the intent of using them as gifts, the magnetic parts don’t all work, all it is a a piece of like parachute material.
customer_reviews.author: Heather schlager

customer_reviews.title: It worked, but not a time saver
customer_reviews.text: This item did work, however it seemed to take forever every time I would install it. And if there was any significant snow, it was a little difficult to remove because it was so flimsy. Magnets are a good idea, but I worry about the paint on my vehicle. I bought a little more expensive but sturdier product that does the job well to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big car with a really large windshield, so it's a little challenging getting the windshield cover on by myself, but it's worth it! I love not having to scrape my windows in the mornings. I like this so much, that I even offered to get one form my son.
customer_reviews.author: alienea

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems to be
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the item I ordered did not look like the visual product. I expected the material to look as thick as the one advertised. It is not what I wanted, but it is what I got! Not satisfied, but no choice in the matter.
customer_reviews.author: Valrita Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Using it on my work van, 2017 Ford Transit. This thing has a huuuuge windshield and the cover I previously purchased was too small. The Ice King Magnetic Cover is perfect size, the magnets work great!. Straps around the mirrors are also awesome. Just a tip when taking it off don't drag the magnets on the car body, just pull them away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used once
customer_reviews.text: Literally froze to the windshield. Put it on dry, it started as wet snow, then gradually a little lighter. Still froze to windshield and tore the first time removing.
customer_reviews.author: Black Hawk

customer_reviews.title: One use product
customer_reviews.text: Not as shown. No printing to give a hint left/right or top/bottom. Forget about installing in any wind. Forget about reinstalling when wet/snowy. Many far better products out there. Far easier to use and reuse in bad weather, which is when you need the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best snow/frost shield I found and for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large and 2 small from an Instagram ad. The large worked on my minivan, but the small size did not cover the windshield of my sedans. I saw this one and it provides ample coverage of my van's windshield. I will use the large one I bought previously for one of my sedans. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: tspagetts

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and the magnets probably won’t work in the weather we have in Illinois, I got this for snow, not sure if it’s going to work out, save your money on this
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Single thin layered material
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for my F350 Superduty. First it does fit. It was returned due to it not being a thick padded with reflective material like others I had been researching. The main reason is, it is a single thin layer that didnt seem to be a good ripstop material. It also didn't Seem or feel strong enough to have held up to ice and wind. Snow and frost yes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great. A bit big for a 2019 Chevy Traverse
customer_reviews.text: Works as adverstised. Kind of wish the flaps that go inside the vehicle had more weight or eleastic to attach to something on the interior instead of just hanging loose, since closing the vehicle door will typically push air outward, billowing the windshield cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Off...we go!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea in protecting windshield from the elements. In the case of wet, it was to be determined how to store it wet. Nonetheless, it is so nice to take it down and go as opposed to sit and defrost.
customer_reviews.author: Triniinus

customer_reviews.title: Great item and seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two of my sons who are moving to Michigan this month. We haven’t got to use it yet but it was delivered very fast and they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this, as I live in Wisconsin and our winter has been terrible. When I first went to use it, I found it difficult to figure out what way it went, because it all looked the same, and although the Magnets are great, it makes it a lot harder to put on because they stick to everything, then putting it on the other side of the vehicle( I have a large SUV) that wasn’t easy either. Yes it worked for snow and ice, but it takes a lot of work to put the thing on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but the material is kind of flimsy. I don't think that this would stand up to any kind of wind storm. The one corner tore in what I considered a light wind this winter, in Pennsylvania.
customer_reviews.author: preppergb

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without them
customer_reviews.text: It gets easier to install each time I use the windshield covers. I get a lot of snow at 8,500 feet elevation, and so it makes my life so much easier not having to scrape the windshield. Love them; I bought two. Happy Camper.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes H. Benink Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Items
customer_reviews.text: The items that I ordered were very well made and worked fairly well ,i say this because I did not quite get the window at the top covered well enough when I installed the item ,that not withstanding they still managed to do a good job and I am pleased with the items. regards Safety Minded
customer_reviews.author: safety minded

customer_reviews.title: Don't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October of 2018 and it is now ruined. The sun and elements dried it out and the wind ripped it to shreds. Would not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: MarkW

customer_reviews.title: Light material.
customer_reviews.text: Little light weight and magnets come up in the wind and don't stay connected. A heavier material may work better with a stronger magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Carter

customer_reviews.title: great find
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover. it protects windshield so I don't have to scrape. im only 5ft 5 so putting on is a little challenging and I also have a antenna on top of my Tahoe that makes it not fit exactly how its supost to but it works
customer_reviews.author: Holly B

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: It gets cold where I live and using this to cover my windshield every night has proven to save me time in the morning so I don't have to defrost my windshield for 15 minutes before I leave the house. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it's CRACKED up to be
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty short and it was very difficult to install by myself. With help it was ok but it didn't keep the frost off the window anyway. I should return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stayed in place in a blizzard
customer_reviews.text: This is the truck after a 60 mph blizzard hit my area in northern Michigan today!. Got to flopping around but stayed in place. I am Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry B0000

customer_reviews.title: Unless you want a very large semi cover, keep your money.
customer_reviews.text: This was awful. I ordered a windshield cover. Not a car cover. WAY to big. Flimsy fabric . Took two of us to fold it up to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this windshield cover once, but it easy to use and worked well. The included sheet showing how to use was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jim59

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of time and money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be receiving the product in the video but received a cheap knock off. I tried to use it both ways(during different snow falls), the only decent part was the magnets that semi held the cover in place. When I tried to remove the cover, it was stuck to the windshield and I had to scrape a thick layer of ice off the windshield. Fortunately it wasn’t expensive but still, a HUGE waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raigan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ice King
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. It arrived just as promised. I loved the fact that the seller sent a follow up email to be sure I was pleased with the product. I would definitely order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: PaulaFlanagan

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY ON WINDSHIELD
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are not strong enough to hold cover in place if it is windy. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mchugh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible / dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutley terrible. The littlest of all wind will take make everything so difficult. It is very very light and the magnets do not hold it to the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Magnets Scratch Paint
customer_reviews.text: Magnets that hold windshield cover in place scratched my paint. Especially when applying cover in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: BEW80302

product_meta.title: Magnetic Windshield Cover - Huge Size Fits Any Car, Truck, SUV, Van or Automobile - Keeps Ice & Snow Off - Top Quality Exterior Auto Snow Windshield Cover with Magnetic Edges
product_meta.description:
Sure, ice and snow can be beautiful when it's covering the ground, but it's hard to love the winter weather when you have to spend an hour or more in the freezing cold scraping your car! The good news is that you can get through winter without having to reach for that scraper a single time with the IceKing Car Windshield Snow Cover!

The IceKing Car Windshield Snow Cover is a completely waterproof, snow-proof and ice-proof windshield cover that fits any make and model of vehicle. Once in place, the car windshield snow cover serves as a barrier to winter weather, so you can simply pull it off before you hit the road and never have to scrape.

While there are other windshield covers available on Amazon, no other car windshield cover is quite like the IceKing Car Windshield Snow Cover! Our car & truck windshield snow cover is the absolute best that money can buy because it's:

- BIGGER. At 50 inches by 70 inches in size our auto windshield cover is a universal car, SUV &; truck windshield cover that will fit any make and model!

- TRULY WINDPROOF. Our magnetic windshield cover features N52 rare earth magnets to keep the exterior windshield cover anchored to your vehicle. Because we use the best magnets money can buy, make our windshield snow cover magnetic design more windproof than others.

- STRONGER. Our car and truck windshield cover features tie straps and security flaps to anchor inside of your car to keep it in place.

- GUARANTEED. Our automobile windshield cover is backed by a 30-day money-back guarantee.

Retire your ice scraper for good! Protect your car all season long with the absolute best windshield cover for winter on Amazon!

Order the IceKing Car Windshield Snow Cover now.
feature_bullets: WHY SCRAPE ALL WINTER LONG? Our windshield cover eliminates the hassles of winter weather! It works as a windshield snow cover and ice and frost windshield cover. Just lift it off after bad weather, and you're ready to drive!

NO WORRIES ABOUT HIGH WINDS This magnetic windshield cover has ultra powerful rare earth N52 Magnets in the edges to keep the exterior windshield cover in place on your vehicle. Even the strongest winds are no match for this windshield snow covers magnetic grip!

ULTRA SECURE With its security flaps and ties, the automobile windshield cover can be tucked into the doors. As a result, the auto windshield cover can't be easily stolen, and the car & truck windshield cover stays in place perfectly
TRULY UNIVERSAL SIZE Measures 50" x 70" to work as a truck windshield snow cover, SUV truck windshield cover or car windshield snow cover for any make and model of vehicle

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE Our car windshield cover is the absolute best windshield cover for winter. We guarantee it's the top choice among the windshield covers on Amazon, and we back up that promise with a 30 day money-back guarantee
